interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Refillable Amber 16 Ounce Glass Spray Bottles with Labels (4 Pack) - Perfect for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products Aromatherapy - Durable Trigger Sprayer w/Mist and Stream Settings Review Date: 2019/10/06 Store: Arubas Apothecary Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Arubas Apothecary', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.2 x 7 x 6.4 inches; 3.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '601202246434'} Review Text: I got these to help apply body oil, but ended up using them for that and more.
They are great for cleaning if you like to use your own homemade products or just like to buy refill for products without wrestling with those chintzy plastic bottles.
I particularly like that glass is pretty much chemically neutral, so you don't have worry about these breaking down or interacting with what you put in them.

Of course because they are glass, they can break, but the fact that they are glass is more of a positive for me than a negative. Review Title: Wide range of uses, very nice addition to almost any household Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Honey House Naturals Large Bee Bar Solid Lotion, 2 oz, Citrus Honey House Naturals ['Honey House Bee Bar Large 2.0 oz - Citrushas a soft aroma of beeswax, almond oil, cocoa butter and other natural ingredients. It is also presented in a silver colored tin with a silver colored bee embossed label on the lid. The large bar should last six to seven months if you use it every day. Place the bar on a glass or acrylic plate in the bathroom, kitchen, next to the bed or on the desk. It will not dry out. The tin is great to store buttons, needles or other small items. Ingredients: Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Jojoba, Lanolin, Almond Oil, Vitamin E and Bees Wax.Citrus is filled with the sweet tang of Tangerine, Orange and Lime.'] {'Brand': 'Honey House Naturals', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LLC', 'UPC': '689483150305 609459662861', 'Manufacturer': 'Honey House Naturals'} this is a great product that I have used for several years, a solid bees wax based formula, especially good on chronic dry spots, easy to travel with-no spills to worry about. long lasting bar busy bees Refillable Amber 16 Ounce Glass Spray Bottles with Labels (4 Pack) - Perfect for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products Aromatherapy - Durable Trigger Sprayer w/Mist and Stream Settings Arubas Apothecary {'Brand': 'Arubas Apothecary', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.2 x 7 x 6.4 inches; 3.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '601202246434'} I got these to help apply body oil, but ended up using them for that and more.
They are great for cleaning if you like to use your own homemade products or just like to buy refill for products without wrestling with those chintzy plastic bottles.
I particularly like that glass is pretty much chemically neutral, so you don't have worry about these breaking down or interacting with what you put in them.

Of course because they are glass, they can break, but the fact that they are glass is more of a positive for me than a negative. Wide range of uses, very nice addition to almost any household
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user strongly prefers solid lotion products, particularly those featuring natural ingredients, but has also shown interest in multifunctional glass spray bottles.
- **Scent Preference:** They enjoy citrus scents, specifically reminiscent of tangerine, orange, and lime.
- **Usage Insight:** The user values products that effectively treat chronic dry skin and appreciates long-lasting hydration solutions. Their recent purchase indicates a broader interest in practical household items that serve multiple uses.
- **Travel Compatibility:** They prioritize travel-friendly products and solutions that prevent spills, highlighting a desire for convenience in their lifestyle.
- **Brand Loyalty:** The user has a history of utilizing Honey House Naturals products, showcasing loyalty and satisfaction, while also engaging with other brands like Arubas Apothecary for versatile household items.
- **Functionality and Storage:** They favor multifunctional items, as evidenced by their recent purchase of refillable glass bottles for various applications. They appreciate products with reusable packaging that enhance overall value, as the glass material ensures longevity and negligible chemical interaction with contents.

Overall, the user is focused on quality, practicality, and natural ingredient-based products, seeking both effective hydration solutions and convenience in everyday items to support their lifestyle.
